Why Investors Are So Nervous About Japanese Bonds

2025-05-28 05:43 | 分类： finance
Japan’s bond market has burst back onto the global stage, ending years of uneventful trading with a spike in volatility that is worrying investors already spooked by frictions in US Treasuries.
